attributes.action: Help stop/ fight  the amazon rainforest fires
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of species of this beautiful planet are at risk. WE CANNOT SIMPLY IGNORE THIS!
The oxygen we all need to live will also be affected if we stand by and do nothing

When the cathedral at nitre dame was in fire the world cried. Let’s do the same for the amazon and help save the world we all live on
attributes.background:
The lungs of the earth are dying and the world needs to react. Now! 

The Amazon is often referred to as the planet's lungs, producing 20% of the oxygen in the Earth's atmosphere. 

We all need to act to save this planet and what is happening right now is a major point in all our lives.
